output.sentences: The band was ready to play.
There was a party, and the crowd was having fun.
Friends were drinking together while listening to the music, getting tipsy and being silly.
The lead guitarist opened the set, and got the crowd's attention away from their drinks by jamming.
People enjoyed the music and wanted to take pictures with the band after their set.
